getPoolVersion().details: This is typically only useful in complex Pool deployment schemes, where multiple subsystems need to know about each other. Note that this value will only be updated at factory creation time.

getPoolVersion().notice: Returns a JSON representation of the deployed pool version containing name, version number and task ID.
